chapter.text: You ready your stance and put up your fists.^1500 Ready to take whatever blows come your way.^1500 You hear your teacher fumbling with her keys as she tries to unlock a closet nearby.^1500 “There might be an unlocked window in here.^1500 The Janitor usually doesn’t get them all” She says, out of breath.^1500 You can only watch as the figure approaches, and looks down at you.
